Index: 
===================================================================
--- 
+++ 
@@ -11,9 +11,9 @@
 video {
   display: block;           /* Makes video a block element */
   margin: 20px auto;        /* Centers horizontally */
   max-width: 500px;         /* Medium max width */
-  width: 2%;              /* Responsive scaling */
+  width: 20%;              /* Responsive scaling */
   height: auto;             /* Keeps aspect ratio */
   background: #000;
   border-radius: 12px;
   box-shadow: 0 0 15px rgba(0, 242, 234, 0.4);

Index: 
===================================================================
--- 
+++ 
@@ -12,9 +12,9 @@
   display: block;           /* Makes video a block element */
   margin: 20px auto;        /* Centers horizontally */
   max-width: 500px;         /* Medium max width */
   width: 20%;              /* Responsive scaling */
-  height: auto;             /* Keeps aspect ratio */
+  height: 70%;             /* Keeps aspect ratio */
   background: #000;
   border-radius: 12px;
   box-shadow: 0 0 15px rgba(0, 242, 234, 0.4);
   transition: transform 0.3s ease, box-shadow 0.3s ease;

Index: 
===================================================================
--- 
+++ 
@@ -6,15 +6,16 @@
   <title>FTikTok — Dashboard</title>
   <link href="https://fonts.googleapis.com/css2?family=Poppins:wght@400;600;700&display=swap" rel="stylesheet">
   <link rel="stylesheet" href="styles.css" />
   <style>
-
 video {
-  display: block;           /* Makes video a block element */
-  margin: 20px auto;        /* Centers horizontally */
-  max-width: 500px;         /* Medium max width */
-  width: 20%;              /* Responsive scaling */
-  height: 70%;             /* Keeps aspect ratio */
+  display: inline-block;      /* Puts videos next to each other */
+  vertical-align: top;        /* Aligns tops nicely */
+  margin: 10px;               /* Spacing between videos */
+  max-width: 250px;           /* Set a nice max size */
+  width: 100%;                /* Fill available space inside container */
+  height: 180px;              /* Fixed thumbnail height */
+  object-fit: cover;          /* Crop nicely */
   background: #000;
   border-radius: 12px;
   box-shadow: 0 0 15px rgba(0, 242, 234, 0.4);
   transition: transform 0.3s ease, box-shadow 0.3s ease;
@@ -23,8 +24,12 @@
 video:hover {
   transform: scale(1.05);
   box-shadow: 0 0 25px rgba(255, 0, 80, 0.5);
 }
+
+.video-container {
+  text-align: center;         /* Center all inline videos */
+}
   </style>
 </head>
 
 <body>
